channel.title: Homes on Kevin Webber
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Kevin Webber

item.title: Kevin Webber
item.description: I’m Founder and Principal Consultant at RedElastic, a consulting firm based out of Toronto, Canada, that equips organizations with the skills necessary to build event-driven, reactive systems. RedElastic specializes in training and consulting on subjects such as event-driven architeciture, microservices, and cloud-enablement. Before starting Lightbend in 2016, I worked for Lightbend (formerly Typesafe) as Developer Advocate and Enterprise Architect. Lightbend is the corporate steward behind the Scala programming language, Akka distributed systems framework, Play web framework, and Lagom microservices framework.
